ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced smithing techniques
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into advanced smithing techniques allows stronger and more durable materials, significantly expanding the range of melee weapons available for creation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: vibroweapon technology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Through the use of highly advanced tools and components you develop the ability to craft vibroweapons at the machining table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: power weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: By inlaying layers of metal with imprinted nano-circuitry, it is possible to create extremely strong melee weapons which circulate a powerful store of energy at the advanced machining table.
